00010 BinaryController::BinaryController(Approximator* approx) : BasicController(approx) {
00011     
00012     // Function approximator must have only 1 output.
00013     assert(approx->getOutputDim() == 1);

00026 void BinaryController::getAction(Observation& obs, Vector& action,  bool computeGrad) {
00027     
00028     int sampledAct = 0;
00029     double expDist = 0;
00030     double pr=0;
00031 
00032     assert(action.size() == 1);
00033     //Vector tmp(approx->outputs);
00034     approx->doApprox(obs, dist);
00035 
00036     expDist = exp((dist)[0]);
00037     pr = 1.0/(expDist + 1.0);
00038     if (pr >= random()/(double)RAND_MAX) sampledAct = 1;
00039  
00040     action[0] = sampledAct;
00041     
00042     if (computeGrad) {
00043         (dist)[0] = pr;
00044         if (sampledAct) (dist)[0] *= -expDist;
00045         approx->feedbackGrad(obs, dist);
00046     }
00047 
00048 }
00049 
00050 
00056 void BinaryController::getMostProbAction(Observation& obs, Vector& action) { 
00057 
00058     double expDist = 0;
00059     double pr=0;
00060 
00061     assert(action.size() == 1);
00062     //Vector tmp(approx->outputs);
00063     approx->doApprox(obs, dist);
00064 
00065     expDist = exp((dist)[0]);
00066     pr = 1.0/(expDist + 1.0);
00067     // If we choose this action with more than prob 0.5, this is the max prob action
00068     if (pr >= 0.5) action[0] = 1;
00069     else action[0] = 0;
00070 
00071 }
00072 }
